skills.name: Basic Attack
skills.desc: Normal attack using Close-Range weapons.

skills.name: Strength UP 1
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Master's Stance
skills.desc: Attacks hit the enemy's vitals. Increases Critical by 40. Decreases Lng-R by 10, and MP regeneration by 1.

skills.name: Sword Maniac
skills.desc: Close-Range fighting technique. Passive skill that increases Cls-R ATK. (Cls-R +3)

skills.name: Strength UP 2
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Strength UP 3
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Combo Attack
skills.desc: Normal attack using Close-Range weapons.

skills.name: Strength UP 4
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Armor Break
skills.desc:
Knock off your enemies' armor with heavy attacks, making your next attack stronger.
(Each hit has a chance to land a debuff. Debuff has a chance to decrease target's Blunt, Charge, and/or Slash resistance by 10%)

skills.name: Heavy Attack
skills.desc: A heavier attack than usual.

skills.name: Strength UP 5
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Gatling Strike
skills.desc: Delivers a series of blows that make up for their individual weakness in number.

skills.name: Dragon Sweep
skills.desc: Sweeps like a dragon tail mowing down foes. Inflicts damage to all enemies in the vicinity based on weapons damage stats.

skills.name: Crescent Slash
skills.desc: Slashes enemies with crescent blades and inflicts all enemies in front of users Force-based damage.

skills.name: Tail of the Dragon
skills.desc: Whips enemy with the tail of the Dragon and inflicts all enemies in around the user with Weapon-based damage.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Shadowy Spiral Wave
skills.desc: Slashes at surrounding enemies feet, stopping their movement. Deals varying damage to all enemeies in area, depending on weapon.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Giant Swing
skills.desc: Using centrifugal force, perform two rotating attacks that damages any nearby enemies. Inflicts Weapon-based damage on enemies.

skills.name: Three Step Crescent Moon
skills.desc: Crescent energy is released 3 times in a row. Deals varying damage to enemies in front of the user, depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Maelstrom
skills.desc: A smashing attack powerful enough to fell a group of trees with one blow. Inflicts weapon-based damage on all enemies in the area.

skills.name: Vulcan Hit
skills.desc: A hit that threatens to break their defense. Deals varying damage to one enemy, depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Asura Charge
skills.desc: Charges like Asura and barrages an enemy with weapon-based damage in a rain of carnage.

skills.name: Heaven's Gate
skills.desc: Jumps and attacks from the air with fists and inflicts the enemy with damage based on the weapon.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Self-Explosion
skills.desc: Put your heart and soul into a big blow. Although user dies, all enemies in a straight line receive suicide based damage according to their HP.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Tyrannical Jaw
skills.desc: Break your foe's defense, then deliver a blow from behind. Deals varying damage to one enemy, depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Blade of the King Beast
skills.desc: An attack of quite violent brutality, like a wild beast armed with a sword. Although weak in impact, blows can be delivered in rapid succession. Delivers weapon-based damage to a single enemy.

skills.name: Large Cut
skills.desc: An attack that puts your entire body and soul into a single blow. Delivers weapon-based damage to a single enemy.

skills.name: Range Shot
skills.desc: Normal attack using projectile weapon.

skills.name: Speed UP 1
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: 13 Snipe
skills.desc: Sniping. Increases Critical by 40. Decreases CLS-R by 10, and MP regeneration by 1.

skills.name: Gun Maniac
skills.desc: Shooting skill learned through training. Passive skill that raises LNG-R ATK. (Long-Range +3)

skills.name: Speed UP 2
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: Speed UP 3
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: Long-Range Shot
skills.desc: Aim accurately, and hit a distant target.

skills.name: Speed UP 4
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)
Fire a shot that creates a vacuum behind it. All enemies between the user and the target are damaged. (Type Line AoE)

skills.name: Speed UP 5
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: Heartbreaker
skills.desc: Aims for your enemy's vitals, momentarily lowering their long-range defense.

skills.name: Trigger Happy
skills.desc: Enables 3 rapid shots to the enemy. Deals damage based on weapon type.

skills.name: Magnificent 7
skills.desc: Firing faster than human sight. Can be fired 7 times in succession. Special attack that deals fixed damage.

skills.name: Eraser
skills.desc: Enables 6 rapid shots to the enemy through intense concentration. Weapon-based damage.

skills.name: Max MP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max MP. (MAX MP +15, MP Regen + 1)

skills.name: Viper Scope
skills.desc: Aims for the gaps in the enemy's armor, and increase the damage of follow-up projectile, pierce, and shot attacks. Weapon-based damage.

skills.name: Max MP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max MP. (MAX MP +15, MP Regen + 1)

skills.name: Bullet-ridden Pit
skills.desc: Fills your enemy with holes through random fire. Varying damage to one enemy. Shot range is short.

skills.name: Heavy Sonic Trigger
skills.desc: After every shot, a countdown to the gallows. High knockback.

skills.name: Qi Shot
skills.desc: Gather bio-energy and fire a shot without bullets. Deals varying damage to one enemy depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Blast Trigger
skills.desc: Enables 7 chain attacks on a target. Deals a good amount of weapon-based damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Basic Guard
skills.desc: The user stands in a defensive stance, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Slows enemies' attack recovery.

skills.name: Vitality UP 1
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Smite Guard
skills.desc: The user stands in an Anti-Demon stance, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Slows enemies' attack recovery even longer.

skills.name: Stun Guard
skills.desc: The user stands in a defensive stance, decreasing Attack and Spin damage, and inflicts a Stun effect.

skills.name: Exceed Guard
skills.desc: A switch skill which can switch between on and off. The most powerful guard available. Activating which accuracy will reduce incanation time, however the critical attack will decrease. (Incantation -50%, Critical -20)

skills.name: Vitality UP 2
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Power Guard
skills.desc: The user guards, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Force enemies back with all your might.

skills.name: Vitality UP 3
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Whither Guard
skills.desc: The user guards, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Damage of follow-up close-range skills are raised.

skills.name: Vitality UP 4
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Resolution Guard
skills.desc: The Player gets into a Guard stance, but is unable to reduce Attack and Spin damage. However, the Player becomes able to blow the opponent away through sheer willpower.

skills.name: Vitality UP 5
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Speed Block
skills.desc: The Player immediately gets into a Guard stance that can reduce Attack and Spin damage. The opponent will recover easily, but with lowered defense.

skills.name: Tetra Counter
skills.desc: he user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage.

skills.name: Sword Slap
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with no effect on Friendship level.

skills.name: Poison Counter
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage and Poison effect.

skills.name: Bind Counter
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage and Bind effect.

skills.name: Counter Zwei
skills.desc: A switch skill which can switch between on and off. The most powerful counter available. Activating with accuracy will reduce incantation time, however the user's critical attack will also decrease. (Incantation -50%, Critical -20)

skills.name: Vampire Counter
skills.desc: User goes into a Counter stance, counters Attack and Rush. Deals damage to both the enemy's HP and MP. (Absorbs 1/2th of damage as MP. If MP damage is less than 2, you will only absorb 1 MP.)

skills.name: In-Fight Counter
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage, but the enemy is not knocked back. Follow-up attacks are possible.

skills.name: Strikeback (Bash)
skills.desc: The user gets into a Counter stance that can deliver tremendous damage when countering an Attack or Rush move. Damages surrounding enemies.

skills.name: Strikeback (Soul)
skills.desc: The user gets into a Counter stance that can severely deplete the opponent's MP when countering an Attack or Rush move. Damages surrounding enemies.

skills.name: Strikeback (World)
skills.desc: The user gets into a Counter stance that can deliver tremendous damage when countering an Attack or Rush move. Damages surrounding enemies. (Larger range than Strikeback (Bash))

skills.name: Basic Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage.

skills.name: Luck UP 1
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Pyro Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and hits enemies with a fire-based effect.

skills.name: Stun Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and hits enemies with a Stun effect.

skills.name: Luck UP 2
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Dodge Drain
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage. Steals MP from enemies.

skills.name: Luck UP 3
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Petra Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and hits enemies with a Stone effect.

skills.name: Luck UP 4
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Dodge (Shot Failure)
skills.desc: The Player gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage while reducing Long-Range and Spell damage inflicted by the opponent.

skills.name: Dodge (Grace of Feather)
skills.desc: The Player becomes light as a feather and can swiftly get into Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and reduces the elemental resistances of the opponent.

skills.name: Luck UP 5
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Ultrasonic Dodge
skills.desc: The Player becomes unbelievably nimble and can almost immediately get into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage.

skills.name: Dia
skills.desc: Curative magic for an ally's HP.

skills.name: Posmundi
skills.desc: Removes Poison and Plague effects from nearby allies.

skills.name: Media
skills.desc: Curative magic for the HP for an ally in your vicinity.

skills.name: Charmdi
skills.desc: Removes Happy, Charm, Panic and Berserk from nearby allies.

skills.name: Paraladi
skills.desc: Removes Paralyze affects from nearby allies.

skills.name: Patra
skills.desc: Removes Bind, Sleep and Blind from nearby allies.

skills.name: Closedi
skills.desc: Removes Mute and Freeze effects from nearby allies.

skills.name: Diarama
skills.desc: Curative magic for an ally's HP.

skills.name: Recarm
skills.desc: Resurrects a dead ally with 25% of their MAX HP restored.

skills.name: Mediarama
skills.desc: Curative magic for the HP for an ally in your vicinity.

skills.name: Petradi
skills.desc: Removes Stone effects from nearby allies.

skills.name: Etnadi
skills.desc: Removes Amnesia effects from nearby allies.

skills.name: Diarahan
skills.desc: Curative magic for an ally's HP.

skills.name: Recarmdora
skills.desc: Although user dies, resurrects all dead ally in vicinity with 40% of their MAX HP restored.

skills.name: Mediarahan
skills.desc: Curative magic for the HP for an ally in your vicinity.

skills.name: Samarecarm
skills.desc: Resurrects a dead ally with 50% of their MAX HP restored.

Effects 'Curse of the Wretched' by 10%
Effects 'Magic Fist' by 30%

skills.name: Agi
skills.desc: Launches a burst of fire at an enemy, inflicting Fire-based damage and Burn effect.

skills.name: Bufu
skills.desc: Hurls clusters of ice at an enemy, inflicting Ice-based damage and Freeze effect.

skills.desc: Delivers a shockwave at an enemy, inflicting Force-based damage and Stun effect.

skills.name: Mabufu

skills.desc: Delivers huge shockwave at all enemies in range, inflicting Force-based damage and Stun effect.

skills.name: Megido
skills.desc: Destruction magic with apocalyptic results. Inflicts Almighty-based damage on an enemy.

skills.name: Maragion Accel
skills.desc: Fire up to 2 Maragion shots with only one spell cast. However, the MP cost is 1.3 times a normal Maragion.

skills.name: Mabufula Accel
skills.desc: Fire up to 2 Mabufula shots with only one spell cast. However, the MP cost is 1.3 times a normal Mabufula.

skills.name: Ziondyne
skills.desc: Launches a bullet of electrical energy at an enemy, inflicting Electric-based damage and Shock effect.

skills.name: Zandyne
skills.desc: Magic for generating a shockwave that inflicts an enemy with Forced-based damage and Stun effect.

skills.name: Mazionga Accel
skills.desc: Fire up to 2 Mazionga shots with only one spell cast. However, the MP cost is 1.3 times a normal Mazionga.

skills.name: Mazanma Accel
skills.desc: Fire up to 2 Mazanma shots with only one spell cast. However, the MP cost is 1.3 times a normal Mazanma.

skills.name: Agidyne
skills.desc: Launches a burst of fire at an enemy, inflicting Fire-based damage and Burn effect.

skills.name: Bufudyne
skills.desc: Hurls clusters of ice at an enemy, inflicting Ice-based damage and Freeze effect.

skills.name: Megidora
skills.desc: Destructive magic with apocalyptic results. Inflicts Almighty-based damage on all enemies in range.

skills.name: Maziodyne
skills.desc: A magic for generating a sudden electrical phenomenon that inflicts Electric-based damage and Shock effect on all enemies in range. Damage will not affect incantation, but knockback can.

skills.name: Mazandyne
skills.desc: Discharge force suddenly, inflicting Force-based damage and Stun effect on all enemies in range. Damage will not affect incantation, but knockback can.

skills.name: Maragidyne
skills.desc: Launches countless firebursts at all enemies in range, inflicting Fire-based damage and Burn effect on all enemies in range. Damage will not affect incantation, but knockback can.

skills.name: Mabufudyne
skills.desc: Pours a rain of hail on all enemies in range, inflicting Ice-based damage and Freeze effect on all enemies in range. Damage will not affect incantation, but knockback can.

skills.name: Megidoraon
skills.desc: Destructive magic with apocalyptic results. Inflicts Almighty-based damage on all enemies in range. Damage will not affect incantation, but knockback can. Weapons will not lose durability through usage of this skill.

skills.name: Traesto
skills.desc: Allows the user and their partner to transcend time and distance to arrive at their Home Point. Casting time is long. Only use when you cannot return to town normally. (15 Minute)

skills.name: Rakukaja
skills.desc: Raises a shield against the Assiah, temporarily increasing the Physical Defense of one ally by 5. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Intelligence UP 1
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Intelligence. (Intelligence +3)

skills.name: Sukukaja
skills.desc: Raises a shield against the Atziluth, temporarily raising the resistance of an ally to critical hits and critical chance by 15. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Makakaja
skills.desc: Heightens an ally's synchronicity with the Assiah, thereby increasing an ally's Support and Spell by 8. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Samakaja
skills.desc: Creates a shield synchronous to the Atziluth, thereby increasing an ally's Magic Defense by 5. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Tarukaja
skills.desc: Heightens an ally's synchronicity with the Assiah, thereby increasing an ally's Close-Range and Long-Range by 8. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Intelligence UP 2
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Intelligence. (Intelligence +3)

skills.name: Tetraja
skills.desc: Creates a magical barrier and negates Expel-based and Death-based damage once. (Lasts 5 minutes)

skills.name: Estoma
skills.desc: Suppress your spirit and calm the hostility of all enemies in the area towards you.

skills.name: Masukukaja
skills.desc: Raises your alignment with the Atziluth. Temporarily raises resistance to critical hits and critical chance of all allies in the area by 15. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Dekunda
skills.desc: Negates all effects of -nda-based debuffs inflicted on you.

skills.name: Intelligence UP 3
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Intelligence. (Intelligence +3)

skills.name: Marakukaja
skills.desc: Create a shield in synchronicity with the Assiah, thereby increasing all nearby allies' Physical Defense by 5. Can be simul-cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Masamakaja
skills.desc: Creates a shield in synchronicity with the Atziluth, thereby increasing all nearby allies' Magic Defense by 5. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Hama
skills.desc: Purifies the wicked and unclean. Inflicts expel-based damage on an enemy.

skills.name: Matarukaja
skills.desc: Improves alignment with the Assiah, temporarily increasing the CLS-R and LNG-R ATK of all allies in the area by 8. Can be simultaneously cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Masamakaja
skills.desc: Improves alignment with the Atziluth, temporarily increasing the Spell and Support of all allies in the area by 8. Can be simul-cast up to 4 times. (Lasts 10 minutes)

skills.name: Intelligence UP 4
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Intelligence. (Intelligence +3)

skills.name: Manma
skills.desc: Purifies the wicked and unclean. Inflicts expel-based damage on all enemies in range.

skills.name: Intelligence UP 5
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Intelligence. (Intelligence +3)

skills.name: Hamaon
skills.desc: Purify the wicked and unclean and inflicts expel-based damage on an enemy, with a low probability for immediate destruction. Damage will not affect spellcast, but knockback can.

curseMagic.name: Curse Magic
curseMagic.tooltip:
Effects 'Curse of the Wretched' by 50%
Effects 'Magic Bullet' by 10%

skills.name: Sukunda
skills.desc: Isolates one of target from the realm of Atziluth and temporarily lowers an enemy resistance to critical hit. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Tarunda
skills.desc: Isolate a single target enemy from the Assiah, temporarily lowering its physical attack power. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Makanda
skills.desc: Isolates one target enemy from the realm of the Atziluth temporarily lowers that target's magic attack power. Can multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Magic UP 1
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Magic. (Magic +3)

skills.name: Pulinpa
skills.desc: Prevents an enemy from thinking rationally. Inflicts Panic effect on one enemy.

skills.name: Shibaboo
skills.desc: Command the enemy to remain in one spot. Inflicts bind effect on a single enemy.

skills.name: Makajam
skills.desc: Dispells the target's magic abilities, inflicting Mute on the enemy.

skills.name: Rakunda
skills.desc: Disrupts a connection to the Assiah, temporarily lowering an enemy's physical defense. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Samanda
skills.desc: Disrupts a connection to the Assiah, temporarily lowering an enemy's magical defense. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Magic UP 2
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Magic. (Magic +3)

skills.name: Dormina
skills.desc: Inflicts Sleep on target enemy.

skills.name: Marin Karin
skills.desc: Forces an enemy to fall in love with you, inflicting Charm.

skills.name: Masukunda
skills.desc: Isolates all enemies near the target of this spell from the realm of Atziluth and temporarily lowers an enemy resistance to critical hit. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Liberama
skills.desc: Plant seeds of hostility in their heart. Magic that forces enemies to attack you.

skills.name: Magic UP 3
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Magic. (Magic +3)

skills.name: Marakunda
skills.desc: Disrupts the Atziluth, temporarily lowering the physical defense of all enemies near the target of this spell. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Masamanda
skills.desc: Distorts the Assiah, temporarily lowering the magical defense of all enemies near the target of this spell. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Mudo
skills.desc: Takes the enemy's life with a curse and inflicts death-based damage.

skills.name: Matarunda
skills.desc: Distorts the Assiah, temporarily lowering the physical attack power of all enemies near the target of this spell. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Mamakanda
skills.desc: Distorts the Assiah, temporarily lowering the magical attack of all enemies near the target of this spell. Can be multiplied up to 4 times.

skills.name: Magic UP 4
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Magic. (Magic +3)

skills.name: Mamudo
skills.desc: Takes enemies' lives with a curse and inflicts death-based damage on all enemies in range.

skills.name: Magic UP 5
skills.desc: Passive Skill that raises Magic. (Magic +3)

skills.name: Mudoon
skills.desc: Steals an enemy's life with a curse. Inflicts death-based damage on an enemy, with a low probability of immediate destruction. Damage will not affect spellcast, but knockback can.

skills.name: Greeting
skills.desc: Start with a warm greeting.

skills.name: 1,000 Macca Contract
skills.desc: Offer a 1,000 Macca compensation for alliance.

skills.name: 1,000 Magnetite Bribe
skills.desc: Offer 1,000 Magnetite in compensation for alliance.

skills.name: Gift: 1 Magic Stone
skills.desc: Offer 1 Magic Stone as compensation.

skills.name: Gift: 1 Jewel
skills.desc: Offer 1 Jewel as compensation.

skills.name: Gift: Gem
skills.desc: Offer a Gem of the demon's liking. Each species has a different favorite.

skills.name: Threaten
skills.desc: Sometimes you have to threaten someone to obtain what you want.

skills.name: Shout
skills.desc: Shout at an unprepared conversation partner. Occasionally inflicts bind effect on the person.

skills.name: Intimidate
skills.desc: Threaten a demon to obtain what you want.

skills.name: Taunt
skills.desc: Taunt your target, thus gaining their attention.

skills.name: Mischief
skills.desc: Get their attention by making mischief. Has a rare chance of inflicting confusion.

skills.name: Instigate
skills.desc: Get the attention of all enemies around the target.

skills.name: Expert Summon

skills.name: Summon Overdrive

skills.name: Biological Enhancement: HP
skills.desc: Through the knowledge of living things you are able to extend your limits. HP is increased, MP is greatly reduced(HP+20%, MP-15%).

skills.desc: Through the knowledge of living things you are able to extend your limits. MP is increased, HP is greatly reduced(MP+20%, HP-15%).

skills.desc: Through the knowledge of living things you are able to extend your limits. Vitality is increased, Strength, Magic, Intelligence, Speed and Luck are greatly reduced(Vitality+25%, Strength, Magic, Intelligence, Speed, Luck-4%).

Effects 'Curse of the Wretched' by 20%
Effects 'Magic Bullet' by 20%
Effects 'Magic Fist' by 40%

skills.name: Sorcery Circulation
skills.desc: A passive skill that reduces MP costs by improving the efficiency of the Player's life energy circulation during incantation. (-25% MP Cost)

skills.name: Lord of the Frost
skills.desc: A switch skill that increases Ice-based damage and reduces incantation time of Ice skills by synchronizing the attacker's soul with the latent power of water that exists in all creation. Also decreases Fire-based damage. (+25% Ice damage, -20% Ice-based skill incantation, -20% Fire damage)

skills.name: Lady of Static
skills.desc: A switch skill that increases Electric-based damage and reduces incantation time by synchronizing the attacker's soul with the latent power of the earth that exist in all creation. Also decreases Force-based damage. (+25% Electric damage, -20% Electric-based skill incantation, -20% Force damage)

skills.name: Advanced Sorcery Circulation
skills.desc: A passive skill that reduced MP costs and incantation time by further improved the efficiency of the Player's life energy circulation during incantation. (-25% MP cost, -15% Spell incantation)

skills.name: Lord of the Storms
skills.desc: A switch skill that increases Force-based damage and reduced incantation time by synchronizing the attacker's soul with the latent power of the wind that exists in all creation. Also decreases Electric-based damage. (+25% Force damage, -20% Force-based skill incantation, -20% Electric damage)

skills.name: Lady of the Flames
skills.desc: A switch skill that increases Fire-based damage and reduced incantation time by synchronizing the attacker's soul with the latent power of the fire that exists in all creation. Also decreases Ice-based damage. (+25% Fire damage, -20% Fire-based skill incantation, -20% Ice damage)

skills.name: Magical Amplification Technique
skills.desc: A passive skill that increases Magic power by improving the efficiency of the Player's life energy circulation. (+15 Spell)

skills.name: Lord and Lady of the Void
skills.desc: A switch skill that increases Almighty-based damage and reduced incantation time by synchronizing the attacker's soul with the latent power of the void that exists in all creation. Also decreases all Elemental damage. (+25% Almighty damage, -20% Almighty-based skill incantation, -10% Fire/Ice/Electric/Force damage)

skills.name: Blessing of Soma
skills.desc: By the power of the Moon, all party members' MAX MP +5.

skills.name: Blessing of Ketu
